title: Git
description: Build a solid foundation in Git, then pair it with advanced version control skills. Learn how to collaborate on projects effectively with GitHub.

courses.descriptionCourse: Git is the most popular version control system that developers use to track and share code. These courses will take you from a complete beginner to proficiency using Git and GitHub.

course.courseDescription: Be introduced to the basic concepts of Git version control.
Get a more advanced introduction and guide to Git.
